Back To Recipes

Get out the following ingredients:

Olive Oil
Butter
White Onion and wash
Ground Gingers and wash
5 Garlic Cloves
Tomato Pastes
Water
Chicken Thigh Packages
Gram Masala
Paprika
Sugar
Cumin
Turmeric
Salt
Black Pepper
Coconut Cream

Recipe

Preheat Instant Pot with Saute setting
Dice White Onion
Dice Garlic Cloves
Cut chicken into 1 inch cubes
Add Olive Oil and Butter into instant pot
Add White Onion and Ground Gingers and all the Garlic Clove
Timer 4 minutes Sear
Add Tomato Pastes
Timer 3 minutes Constantly stir
Put Water in instant pot
Put Chicken Thigh Packages in instant pot
Add spice Gram Masala
Add spice Paprika
Add spice Sugar
Add spice Cumin
Add spice Turmeric
Add spice Salt
Add spice Black Pepper
Timer 5 minutes Pressure cook on high pressure
Timer 10 minutes Let it slow release
Stir in Coconut Cream
